name: mischievous
actor_no_arg: You give a mischievous smile at the trouble you have in mind.
others_no_arg: $n grins mischievously at a nasty idea.
actor_found_target: You grin mischievously at $M, thinking an evil thought.
others_found: $n grins mischievously at $N.  $m must be thinking something evil.
target_found: $n grins mischievously at you.  You inch toward the door.
